name: Gunzfactor.com - Green Theme
description:
a painstaking (emphasis on pain) reproduction of the old green theme for the gunzfactor.com forums for use after the recent update to vbulletin 4.0.*.  

Updates:
3/29 - Fixed the deleted post appearance 
3/31 - Fixed blog backgrounds, skinned profile pages, added locked thread icon
[8/12/10] made some adjustments after the last forum update: poll info fixed, various bg colors, positioning, etc
